rohini kumariya da alankara demahal asun halak karawa siyalu angopanga sakasa budurajanan wahanse pramukha maha sanghaya wahanseta puja kalaha.ee awasthawe dharmaya deshana kala budurajanan wahanse, pera kala karmayak wipaka dima nisa rohini kumariya mese dada rogayakin pida windina bawa pahadili kara dunna.ee athitha kathawa mese ya.me kala rohini kumariya pera baranas raju ge aga mehesiyawa sitiyaya.

prashnaya - eekabaddha wipakshaya wisin dan me aluth deshapalana pakshayak pihituwimata yana bawata rawayak pathira yanawa mokakda ee ke thaththwaya?
ee anuwa sthri purusha yoniwala pramanaya dakwa atha.
heta kirulapana pawathwimata niyamitha eekabaddha wipakshaye mayi raliye sanwidhana katayuthu me wana wita awul jalawak wi athi bawata wishwasa katayuthu aaranchi marga walin wartha we.

pe.wa. tharaka widyawa anuwa grahaloka gaman karanne suryaya ek nabhiyak lesa pihiti ilipsakara pathayaka.namuth jyothishayedi suryaya athulu grahayan pruthiwiya wata wruththakara margayaka gaman karana bawa salaka bala katayuthu karanawa.boho dena medesa balanne upahasayen.suryaya polowa wate gaman karanawa yayi sitha sitina mugdayan lesa thamayi jyothishawedinwa ha jyothishaya pilipadinnanwa salakanne.namuth chalanaya wana wasthu dekak aashritha gananaya kirimedi sapeksha chalithaya salaka (ek wasthuwak nisala lesa salaka eeta sapekshawa anik wasthuwe chalithaya salaka) gananaya kirim nawana widyawedith karanawa.jyothishaye thiyenneth ee wage deyak.

aaghathaya pilibanda jagath ayithiwasikam ketumpatha elidakwima eeye (29) saukhya adhyapana karyanye di sidukerini.shri lanka aaghatha sangamaye sabhapathi udaya ranawaka mahatha wisin saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha wetha ema ketumpatha labadima ehidi sidu kerini.mewara aya-wayen wishesha sthanayak aaghathaya athulu bo nowana rogayan wana pilika, wakugadu yanadi rogawalata janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wisin laba di athi bawa saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha pawasuweya.

monawada magen oyalata kerenna oona’ yayi janadhipathiwaraya wimasuwe daru dariyanta thagi bogada pirinamamini.
